clothes.name: your clothes
clothes.inInv: Your clothes - a set of nice boots, pants, and shirt.
clothes.drop: You take off your clothes and leave them neatly folded on the ground.
clothes.take: You pick your clothes up, dust them off, and put them on again.

flowers.name: flower crown
flowers.inInv: A bunch of orange, hardy desert shrub scrubby flowers. You've tucked one of them behind your ear, the rest are in your satchel.

invUse.keyAction: You make a little flower crown of your surplus flowers, and reverently place them your restored statue's head. Praise be, the last Primeval King has a flower crown!

flowers.drop: You drop the flower crown, but keep the one tucked behind your ear
flowers.take: You pick up the flower crown again.

bag.name: thief's bag
bag.inInv: A small leather bag. It is discolored here and there, as if it has been left out in the rain, or sunlight. A few of the seams have begun to crack.
bag.drop: You drop the nondescript bag to the ground.
bag.take: You pick up the offending bag again, reattaching it to your belt.

coin.name: foreign coin
coin.inInv: A small, round coin. It glints dully.
coin.drop: You drop the coin, and hope that it hasn't stolen your soul.
coin.take: It's irresistible, isn't it..? You reach for the coin again, and there, you hesitate. What would the Mordant Crescent say..? Best not to tell them. You grab the coin and stuff it back into a pocket.

book.name: book of the sacred rites
book.inInv: It probably wasn't theirs to begin with. The cover depicts..something. Looks like an Awakened.
book.drop: You let the book fall to the ground. It probably wasn't useful anyway. Probably.
book.take: You pick the book up. Why the heretics had it, you don't know, but you have a suspicion. You don't like it. Carefully, you put the book in your satchel.

chalk.name: white chalk stick
chalk.inInv: A well-used stick of white chalk, not much longer than your thumb.

invUse.keyAction: You scribble 'PRAISE JOKO' on every wall available. As if in answer of this, a piece of the statue falls onto your head. Where it came from, you have no idea.
invUse.use: You write the praise of Palawa Joko on your chest. For Joko!

chalk.drop: You drop the bit of chalk.
chalk.take: It'll get your fingers white, but, who cares? You pick up the piece of chalk and place it in your satchel.

smelly sock.name: heretic's sock
smelly sock.inInv: It is made from some a very soft material, but it smells too much like the inside of someone's boot. It is also blue.

invUse.keyAction: You decide to put the smelly sock on Joko, gently pulling it on to one of his feet. It's a tad too big for the small statue. You hope he won't mind the smell.
invUse.use: You flap the sock in the air, hoping to get some of the bad smell out.

smelly sock.take: You decide to keep the sock.
smelly sock.drop: On second thoughts, the sock smells so much, so you drop it.

sock.name: blue sock
sock.inInv: A soft blue sock. It doesn't smell that bad.

invUse.keyAction: You touch the sock thoughtfully for a second, before pulling it onto one of Joko's feet. It is a nice color. You hope he'll appreciate it. It is also ridiculously oversized for the statue, but that's just semantics.
invUse.use: You take the sock out and admire its color.

sock.take: You think it might be a nice sock for colder days, and stuff it into your satchel.
sock.drop: The sock was too much of a burden, and you drop it.

fork.name: random fork
fork.take: You pick up the fork. Who knows when an extra fork could come in handy?
fork.drop: On second thoughts, let's not go to Forkelot. You drop it to the ground.

lung.name: lungs
lung.inInv: A set of somewhat preserved lungs.
lung.take: You take the lungs. Why not?
lung.drop: You decide against carrying the half-preserved organs of another person on your body, and drop them on the ground.

lung jar slivers.name: lung jar sliver
lung jar slivers.inInv: A ceramic sliver with an inlay of gold in cross-hatch patterns.
lung jar slivers.take: You pocket a piece of the shattered jar.
lung jar slivers.drop: You think better of stealing things you've destroyed, and drop the piece.

liver.name: someone's liver
liver.inInv: It's kind of dark red and blob-shaped.
liver.take: You pick the sort-of-slimy liver up, and put it in your pack.
liver.drop: You decide against carrying a liver with you, and deposit it. You're not too particular about where it ends up.

red sock.name: red sock
red sock.inInv: A bright red sock. It is soft and smells of death.

invUse.keyAction: You wonder where Joko would like a red sock, but as you only have the one and don't want to make his socks not match, so you wrap it around his neck like a scarf.
invUse.use: You feel the sock in your pocket. It's so..nice.

red sock.take: You think one can't have too many socks, least of all in bright colors, so you pocket it with a smile.
red sock.drop: You weren't such a big fan of red socks after all, and toss it away.

Statue of Palawa Joko.name: joko!
Statue of Palawa Joko.inInv: Your statue of King Joko the Eternal Monarch of All.

statue piece.name: left arm of joko
statue piece.inInv: The left arm of your Joko statue.
statue piece.drop: How dare you drop a piece of Palawa Joko's statue?!
statue piece.take: You pick up the left arm again. Good for you.

statue bit.name: joko's chest
statue bit.inInv: The glorious chest of Palawa Joko! Sadly, he's missing his legs, arms, and head.
statue bit.take: You pick up the statue piece again. Good for you.
statue bit.drop: How dare you drop a piece of Joko's magnificent statue?! .. apparently like this, because, you drop it to the ground.

statue fragment.name: joko's legs
statue fragment.take: You pick the legs up again. Good for you.
statue fragment.drop: You kick the statue fragment. Being the legs and all, it kicks you right back. What..how..?

statue part.name: right arm of joko
statue part.inInv: The head and right arm of Palawa Joko, finely sculpted from pale stone.
statue part.take: You pick up the statue piece.
statue part.drop: You drop a piece of Palawa Joko. Filthy heretic.
